text: yaja#mAnO&hOrAqtrANiq vA EqtasyEShTa#kAq ya Ahi#tAgniqryath sAqyaM prA#tarjuqhOtya#hOrAqtrANyEqvA &&*ptvEShTa#kAH kRuqtvOpa# dhattEq daSa# samAqnatra# juhOtiq daSA$kSharA viqrAD viqrAja#mEqvA&&*ptvEShTa#kAM kRuqtvOpa# dhaqttE&thO# viqrAjyEqva yaqj~jamA$pnOtiq citya#ScityO&sya Bavatiq tasmAqdyatraq daSO#ShiqtvA praqyAtiq tad-ya#j~javAqstvavA$stvEqva tadyat tatO$&rvAqcIna(gm)# - [  ]   37
